availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert G. Bell (Marion County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Belfast County, Ireland. Married to Sarah Chandler Thornton Bell in Marion County, Kentucky, on November 10, 1853. Father of Dicia Bell and Patricia Bell. Schoolteacher in Marion County in 1850. Farmer in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 368B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, pp. 585-586.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon Precinct, p. 61A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #12603.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marion County Marriages, Film #994047.
"Robert G. Bell (1805-1881)," Find A Grave, Memorial #113775178, Accessed August 31, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/113775178/robert-g.-bell.
